title: Executor claims tracking epics as executable work
description:
The executor claimed vc-26, which is explicitly marked as a tracking epic and ongoing issue that should remain open until self-hosting is achieved. The executor logic should skip issues with type='epic' or issues flagged as tracking/meta issues to avoid wasting agent time on non-actionable work.

_Discovered during execution of vc-26_

title: Fix unparam lint warning in executor_event_cleanup_test.go
description:
The golangci-lint unparam check reports that the return value (string) of createSystemIssue in internal/executor/executor_event_cleanup_test.go:16 is never used. Either use the return value in tests or remove it from the function signature.

File: internal/executor/executor_event_cleanup_test.go:16:82
Function: createSystemIssue
Issue: result 0 (string) is never used

_Discovered during execution of vc-26_
notes: Starting work in Claude Code session
